mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.inv_id AS "invInfo.id", a.sku_id AS "skuInfo.id", a.order_id AS "orderHeader.id", a.receive_num AS "receiveNum", a.vend_id AS "vender.id", a.receive_time AS "receiveDate", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_collect_goods_record( id, inv_id, sku_id, order_id, receive_num, vend_id, receive_time, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{invInfo.id}, #{skuInfo.id}, #{orderHeader.id}, #{receiveNum}, #{vender.id}, #{receiveDate}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_collect_goods_record SET inv_id = #{invInfo.id}, sku_id = #{skuInfo.id}, order_id = #{orderHeader.id}, receive_num = #{receiveNum}, vend_id = #{vender.id}, receive_time = #{receiveDate}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
